category.name: Active Workspace
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: AWC_Notification_Timeout
preference.preference_description: Defines the notifications and error message popup time-out (in seconds). For any strictly positive value, notifications and error message popup windows automatically close after the specified time. If the value is zero or negative, there is no time-out, and the user needs close the popup window manually. The default timeout is 6 seconds.
